doc.after: International relations IR or international affairs is a field of political science that studies relationships among countries the roles of sovereign states inter governmental organizations IGOs international non governmental organizations INs non governmental organizations NGOs and multinational corporations MNCs International relations is an academic and a public policy field and so can be positive and normative because it analyzes and formulates the foreign policy of a given State
